text: @NikkiHaley Again, you do nothing but troll for the failed @POTUS who's killing American soldiers for #Putin. Police don't need tanks, coward. Why not call the #coronavirus a hoax? Why not accuse #Obama of inventing the virus and only making Trump LOOK like a soulless racist?
